verses.verse: (A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of David.) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H6664>cause,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my prayer, which is not from <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Let my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from Thy <S%H6440>presence;<s%> Let Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H974>tried<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> Thou hast <S%H6485>visited<s%> [me] by <S%H3915>night;<s%> Thou hast <S%H6884>tested<s%> me and dost <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>nothing;<s%> I have <S%H2161>purposed<s%> that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will not <S%H5674>transgress.<s%>
As for the <S%H6468>deeds<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of Thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> from the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6530>violent.<s%>
My <S%H9036>steps<s%> have <S%H8551>held<s%> <S%H8551>fast<s%> to Thy <S%H4570>paths.<s%> My <S%H6471>feet<s%> have not <S%H4131>slipped.<s%>
I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon Thee, for Thou wilt <S%H6030>answer<s%> me, O <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H565>speech.<s%>

<S%H6395>Wondrously<s%> <S%H6395>show<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3467>Savior<s%> of those who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> at Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> From those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up [against them].
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of the <S%H5869>eye;<s%> <S%H5641>Hide<s%> me in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of Thy <S%H3671>wings,<s%>
From the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> who <S%H7703>despoil<s%> me, My <S%H5315>deadly<s%> <S%H340>enemies,<s%> who <S%H5362>surround<s%> me.
They have <S%H5462>closed<s%> their <S%H2459>unfeeling<s%> [heart]; With their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly.<s%>
They have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps;<s%> They <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H5186>cast<s%> [us] <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

He is <S%H1825>like<s%> a <S%H9030>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>eager<s%> to <S%H2963>tear,<s%> And as a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in <S%H4565>hiding<s%> <S%H4565>places.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6923>confront<s%> him, <S%H3766>bring<s%> him <S%H3766>low;<s%> <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> with Thy <S%H2719>sword,<s%>

From <S%H4962>men<s%> with Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> From <S%H4962>men<s%> of the <S%H2465>world,<s%> whose <S%H2506>portion<s%> is in [this] <S%H9132>life;<s%> And whose <S%H990>belly<s%> Thou dost <S%H4390>fill<s%> with Thy <S%H6840>treasure;<s%> They are <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H1121>children,<s%> And <S%H5117>leave<s%> their <S%H3499>abundance<s%> to their <S%H5768>babes.<s%>
As for me, I shall <S%H2372>behold<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> I will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with Thy <S%H8544>likeness<s%> when I <S%H9516>awake.<s%>
